#summary How to configure ANDP and which other components to install

= Introduction =

ANDP has not yet been widely deployed, and documentation is still sparse. It does, however, work quite well under controlled circumstances on Ubuntu 7.10.

This pages briefly summarises which packages to install and which configuration files to change.

Please be careful when using ANDP. Contributions are very welcome, especially in the are of documentation.
